name: Hungry Alligator MMA-hunt for food, fight for land
name_original: Hungry Alligator MMA-hunt for food, fight for land
description:
Alligator MMA part 1
You are now in the pit as a hungry alligator ! It’s time to show your talent as a hunter and as a fighter into the wild.
You are so hungry with your pals than you chomp all pets around. No mercy for cats, chickens, dogs, ducks, fishes, monkeys, pigs, roosters, snakes are going around. Pets blast like toy blast when you chomp them. More you eat, more you extend your hunting area. Pay attention you have a limit time to be the first hunter.
Watch out for some traps : ropes, nets, punches, snails effects that may drop you down into the jungle. Fortunately some « doctors » are walking around…chump them to recover.
Try to stay alive as long as you can : be aware, when your fellows chomp fatal attack effect you will have small chance to survive ! Indeed, they will become crazy cannibals !

Game Features :

Multiplayer game, free game offline – you can play with 3 friends. Let’s challenge them and compete into the wild.

Alligator against computer – Do you really believe you can trick the computer ? You can face until 3 of them on your device.Having fun when you knock out computer !

Many traps may ruin your mission : will you be able to play hard with some traps or avoid some like ropes, nets, punches, snails effects, fatal attack effect ?
Let’s see how smart and strong you are !

Bonus food in last minute – Eat 1 get 3 : you chomp hard then you may extend quicker your hunting area. During the bonus period time, each pet you eat, gives you one extra pet bonus. Remember to eat your own colored pet otherwise you will support your competitors clans.

Backgrounds : more you compete more you discover hunting lands. Enjoy its !

Hungry Alligator MMA is a multiplayer game with clear game play as pineapple pen game : it’s made to have fun with all friends and family.
Let’s try to defeat the computer as far as you can.

Alligator MMA part 2 : It’s time to show your talents as a pals farmer trainer …in spawning area, in laboratory !
Indeed :
After pick up Eggs from Alligators parents
Grow up Eggs in laboratory Nursery incubator
Here you are : name and feed your Baby new Alligator friend in paradise bay.
Pet your alligator with fruits - give fruits to your alligator when it thirsty !
Grow up your hungry alligator with fresh « animals » you have just captured in the bush !

Train your hungry alligator, chasing animals in the scary marble endless rolling chamber.
Then Fight to survive, and become the Alligator MMA Masterpiece , Champion !


We gather all ingredients to play and have fun with kids, family, and friends. We have been inspired by so many funny Hasbro games who made so many toy game for kids and families. They could created hungry shark too on CN channel!
Good Luck.
This game contain some ads.
Feel free to contact us : toygamestory@gmail.com
You can drop a review on store to share your experience.
Hungry Alligator MMA is a game developed for all by My Famous soft Company Ltd.
